edu.rit.image.png

Class fdATChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.image.png.Chunk
      • edu.rit.image.png.fdATChunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable

    public class fdATChunk
extends Chunk
    Class fdATChunk provides a frame data chunk stored in an APNG file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      fdATChunk()
      Construct a new uninitialized fdAT chunk.
      fdATChunk(int seqnum, byte[] data)
      Construct a new fdAT chunk with data taken from the given array.
      fdATChunk(int seqnum, byte[] data, int off, int len)
      Construct a new IDAT chunk with data taken from a portion of the given array.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class edu.rit.image.png.Chunk

        read, readExternal, write, writeExternal

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • fdATChunk

        public fdATChunk()
        Construct a new uninitialized fdAT chunk. This constructor is for use only by object deserialization.

      • fdATChunk

        public fdATChunk(int seqnum,
         byte[] data)
        Construct a new fdAT chunk with data taken from the given array.
        Parameters:
        seqnum - Chunk sequence number.
        data - Array of chunk data.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.

      • fdATChunk

        public fdATChunk(int seqnum,
         byte[] data,
         int off,
         int len)
        Construct a new IDAT chunk with data taken from a portion of the given array.
        Parameters:
        seqnum - Chunk sequence number.
        data - Array of chunk data.
        off - Index of first byte of chunk data.
        len - Number of bytes of chunk data.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if off < 0, len < 0, or off+len > data.length.
